divs: Sighting Detailswas out side at 1140pm looking at the stars,when i saw a large pole with large light on the ends traveling very fast,i saw it starting from half the sky i countd 1 2 3 4 how fast it traveled and was at an angle,no blinking just dim big light on both ends no noise dark in the middle could see a frame look like a black bar with dim light on both ends traveling fast in a straight line looking at it almost straight up in the sky,was bigger then a jumbo jet i whould say i see planes go by all the time and this was double the spped maybe tripple the speed,was like nothing i have ever seen i am so happy i saw it cool a
Summary: very large bar with lights on the ends traveling at an angle
